question: Name two ancient districts separated by Gravina in Matera, Italy.
asked_question_translated: Nosauciet divus senos rajonus, kurus atdala Gravina Materā, Itālijā.
answer: Gravina Materā atdala vēsturiskos rajonus Sassi di Matera un Civita.
answer_translated_eng: The Gravina in Matera separates the historic districts of Sassi di Matera and Civita.
